text.large-chatlog-warning: Due to large chatlog, some settings will apply on next reload.
text.maybe-reload: Some changes might require a reload.

avatar.name: Avatar
avatar.label: Configure Avatar Settings
avatar.hint: Configure settings related to avatars in chat messages

source.name: Chat avatars
source.hint: Adds an avatar to chat messages

hide-when-token-hidden.name: Hide avatar when token is hidden?
hide-when-token-hidden.hint: Hides avatars when the speaker token is hidden

hide-gm-avatar-when-secret.name: Hide avatar when secret?
hide-gm-avatar-when-secret.hint: Hides avatars whenever GM rolls secret/private rolls

popout-support.name: Enable token avatar popout?
popout-support.hint: Scales the size of token avatars according to the token's scale

reacts-to-degree-of-success.name: Avatar reacts to critical rolls?
reacts-to-degree-of-success.hint: A critical success will glow green, and a critical failure becomes muted and dark

use-user-avatar.name: Use user avatar as fallback?
use-user-avatar.hint: Configure user avatars by right-clicking users in the lower left area of Foundry

moving.name: Moving
moving.hint: Settings related to moving stuff to different places, or changing their form

restructure-card-info.name: Restructure chat card info?
restructure-card-info.hint: Makes action-cost for features more apparent, and moves spell info out of the footer

controls-alignment.name: Controls alignment
controls-alignment.hint: Changes the position of the controls

chat-merge.name: Enable chat merge?
chat-merge.hint: Merges messages sent in a rapid sequence together to save space

adjust-chat-controls.name: Adjust chat controls?
adjust-chat-controls.hint: Restyles rolltype mode to buttons, and convert other chat controls to buttons

adjust-token-effects-hud.name: Adjust token effects HUD?
adjust-token-effects-hud.hint: Makes effects circular and arranges them outside the token, or on the token ring for larger tokens

animate-messages.name: Animate messages to draw attention to certain events?
animate-messages.hint: Makes whispers from players to GM draw more attention

compact-ui.name: Enable Compact UI?
compact-ui.hint: Resizes controls, and hides inactive controls and navigation elements unless hovered

hiding.name: Hiding
hiding.hint: Settings related to removing or minimizing stuff

remove-attack-info-from-damage-roll-mess.name: Remove attack info from damage roll messages?
remove-attack-info-from-damage-roll-mess.hint: Makes damage rolls take up less space by removing redundant hit information. Intended to be used with chat-merge

start-sidebar-collapsed.name: Collapse sidebar by default?
start-sidebar-collapsed.hint: Uses the collapsed state as the initial state

start-navigation-collapsed.name: Collapse navigation by default?
start-navigation-collapsed.hint: Uses the collapsed state as the initial state

no-compendium-banner-images.name: Hide compendium banner images?
no-compendium-banner-images.hint: Removes the compendium banner images in the sidebar

no-logo.name: Hide Foundry logo?
no-logo.hint: Removes the Foundry logo in the top left

no-cards.name: Hide Cards tab?
no-cards.hint: Removes the Cards tab in the sidebar entirely

no-chat-control-icon.name: Hide chat control icon?
no-chat-control-icon.hint: This is the dice icon next to roll options, it tends to crowd the UI

other.name: Other
other.hint: Settings that don't fit cleanly into the other categories

send-to-chat.name: Add 'Send' button to window header?
send-to-chat.hint: Sends content to chat as if sent via sheet

enable-player-tags.name: Enable player tags?
enable-player-tags.hint: Adds a tag containing the name of the player next to the speaker

enable-rolltype-indication.name: Enable rolltype tag?
enable-rolltype-indication.hint: Adds a tag containing the type of roll to chat messages

control-size.name: Control size
control-size.hint: (default: 36px) Changes the size of controls and navigation elements
